Name: FRL Wrist Control: Wrist Movement Decoding from Surface Electromyography
Acknowledgements: Data collected by Meta Reality Labs. BIDS conversion was done at SCCN, INC, UCSD.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Kaifosh, P., Reardon, T.R., & CTRL-labs at Reality Labs. (2025). A generic non-invasive neuromotor interface for human-computer interaction. Nature, 645(8081), 702-711. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-09255-w
EthicsApprovals: Approved by independent external Institutional Review Board (IRB). Participation was voluntary, participants provided informed consent, and data have been de-identified.
